pages.text: With all the items this modpack includes knowing how to search for stuff is crucial. JEI has a few options that can come in handy while looking for stuff, in the form of key symbols you can add to your search, by $(l)typing them before what youâ€™re searching for $(reset)(i.e. @mekanism, %misc etc.):

-@ searches for all the items from a $(l)specific mod$(reset)$(br)-# searches for all the items with a $(l)certain tooltip$(reset)$(br)-% searches for all the items in a $(l)certain creative tab$(reset)$(br)-$ searches for all the items with a $(l)certain tag$(reset)$(br)Also note that $(l)multiple terms work together, adding $(l)- in front of a word blacklists that term $(reset)from the search.
